reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions the collection of data when users engage in certain activities on the website.
reply.reference: We collect information that users provide by filling out forms on the Website, communicating with us via contact forms and providing information when ordering a product or service via the Website. URL: https://myhappymind.org/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects personal information including the type of computer you use, your Internet connection, your IP address, your operating system, and your browser type

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions collecting information automatically through data collection technologies like Google Analytics, associating voluntarily provided personal information with automatically collected information, and using cookies and server logs to gather certain details about users' devices and browsing patterns.
reply.reference: The app collects personal information including the type of computer you use, your Internet connection, your IP address, your operating system, and your browser type. URL: https://myhappymind.org/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use by stating that the information collected is used for providing services, improving performance, delivering products/services, and sending offers, promotions, and information to users.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly outlines that the collected data is utilized for specific purposes related to user services and communication.
reply.reference: We use information you provide to us to deliver the requested product and/or service, to improve our overall performance, and to provide you with offers, promotions, and information. URL: https://myhappymind.org/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users have the right to request access to their data, rectify or erase their personal data, seek restrictions on processing, object to processing, and the right to data portability. Additionally, users can withdraw consent to the processing of personal data. These rights indicate that users can opt out of data collection or request the deletion of their data.
reply.reference: You have the right to request access to your data that the Company stores and the rights to either rectify or erase your personal data. You have the right to seek restrictions on the processing of your data. You have the right to object to the processing of your data and the right to the portability of your data. To the extent that you provided consent to the Company’s processing of your personal data, you have the right to withdraw that consent at any time, without affecting the lawfulness of processing based upon consent that occurred prior to your withdrawal of consent. URL: https://myhappymind.org/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that some content or applications on the website are served by third parties, including advertisers, ad networks, and servers, who may collect information about users when using the website. This information may be associated with personal information and can be used to provide interest-based advertising or other targeted content.
reply.reference: Some content or applications, including advertisements, on the Website are served by third-parties, including advertisers, ad networks and servers, content providers, and application providers. These third parties may use cookies alone or in conjunction with web beacons or other tracking technologies to collect information about you when you use our website. The information they collect may be associated with your personal information... They may use this information to provide you with interest-based (behavioural) advertising or other targeted content. URL: https://myhappymind.org/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with subsidiaries, affiliates, service providers, lawyers, collection agencies, and potential successors in interest.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions sharing data with various entities, including subsidiaries, affiliates, and service providers, among others.
